stories.text:
I've read this article like 5 years ago. It was written by a neuroscientist, it was super long and the conclusion was that computer scientific radically understimate the complexity of human brain.

No matter what query I try I can't find it. Hoping someone here read it too. Thanks!
stories.title: Ask HN: Looking for article comparing human brain with neural nets
Video: What is Free Software (Open Source)? Explained in under 3 minutes
The Para Method: A Universal System for Organizing Digital Information
The West is running out of ways to punish Putin
“Russia can't afford to lose, we need a kind of victory”:former advisor on Putin
1648 Names, Ranks, DOB, and Passport Numbers of Russian Soldiers

stories.text:
sed 's/.\{4\}//' <<eof|flex -8iCrf 
     /* reformat, print json */
    
     int fileno (FILE *);
     #define echo do{if(fwrite(yytext,(size_t)yyleng,1,yyout)){}}while(0)
     #define jmp (yy_start) = 1 + 2 *
     #define pc(x) putchar(x)
    %option nounput noinput noyywrap
    %s x1 
    %%
    \40+ 
     /* quoted values
      "key":" 
      "key": " 
     */
    \"[^\":\]\)]*\":\40*\" echo;jmp x1;
     /* quoted values
      "key":[{ 
      "key": [{ 
     */
    \"[^\":\]\)]*\":\40*\[\40*\{ echo;pc(10);
     /* unquoted, comma-separated array values 
      "key":[ 
      "key": [ 
     */
    \"[^\":\]\)]*\":\40*\[ echo;jmp x1;
     /* quoted values
      "key":{ 
      "key": { 
     */
    \"[^\":\]\)]*\":\40*\{ echo;pc(10);
     /* open brace not closed brace */ 
    <x1>[\]\{\"] echo;pc(10);jmp 0;
    <x1>[^\]\{\"\12]* echo;
    \n|.
    %%
    int main(){ yylex();exit(0);}
eof

    cc  -std=c89 -Wall -pedantic -pipe lex.yy.c -static -o yy059
Usage: yy059 < 1.json

This is made according to own personal JSON readability aesthetics, primarily for reading YouTube JSON. It is used in personal YouTube search utility. JSON from non-YouTube sources, e.g., Twitter, may contain escaped quotes. Remove esacped quotes first, e.g.,

  yy064 < 1.json|yy059
Here is yy064:

    sed 's/.\{4\}//' <<eof|flex -8iCrf
     /* json remove escaped quotes */
    
     int fileno (FILE *);
     #define echo do{if(fwrite(yytext,(size_t)yyleng,1,yyout)){}}while(0)
     #define jmp (yy_start) = 1 + 2 *
     #define pc(x) putchar(x)
     int setenv (const char *, const char *, int);
    
    %option nounput noinput noyywrap
    %%
    ^[\40\11]+
    \134\42
    %%
    int main(){ yylex();exit(0);}
eof

    cc -std=c89 -Wall -pedantic -pipe lex.yy.c -static -o yy064
stories.title: JSON Reformat and Print
